text: Brigitte Rajchl is an Austrian para-alpine skier. She won medals representing Austria at the 1976 Winter Paralympics and at the 1980 Winter Paralympics. She also represented Austria at the 1984 Winter Paralympics and 1988 Winter Paralympics but did not win a medal at these games. == Achievements == {| class="wikitable" width=65% style="font-size:90%; text-align:center;" |- !Year !!Competition !!Location !!Position !!Event !!Time |- | rowspan=3 | 1976 | rowspan=3 | 1976 Winter Paralympics | rowspan=3 | Örnsköldsvik, Sweden | bgcolor=cc9966 | 3rd | Women's Slalom I | 1:48.13 |- | bgcolor=silver | 2nd | Women's Giant Slalom I | 1:46.93 |- | bgcolor=silver | 2nd | Women's Alpine Combination I | 1:46.56 |- | 1980 | 1980 Winter Paralympics | Geilo, Norway | bgcolor=cc9966 | 3rd | Women's Giant Slalom 1A | 2:55.31 |} == See also == * List of Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Paralympic alpine skiers of Austria Category:Alpine skiers at the 1976 Winter Paralympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1980 Winter Paralympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1984 Winter Paralympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1988 Winter Paralympics Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Austria Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Austria Category:Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Medalists at the 1976 Winter Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1980 Winter Paralympics Category:Austrian female alpine skiers Category:Austrian amputees
title: Brigitte Rajchl
